articles.description: Disney+ will bring "Lost", "Family Guy" and other titles from across studios to viewers in Europe, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and Singapore under its new Star channel, the Walt Disney Co streaming service said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: A smartphone with displayed "Disney" logo is seen on the keyboard in this illustration taken March 24, 2020. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic
(Reuters) - Disney+ will bring Lost, Fam… [+1449 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Woody Allen attacks 'hatchet job' documentary on Dylan Farrow abuse allegations - Sky News
articles.description: The celebrated filmmaker again denies the allegations, as his accuser tweets that "speaking the truth is so difficult".
